title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: We are looking for a senior full-stack developer to join our innovative team building next-generation web applications. You'll work with React, Node.js, and cloud technologies to create scalable solutions that serve millions of users worldwide.
requirements: 5+ years experience with React and TypeScript
Experience with AWS or similar cloud platforms

title: Frontend Engineering Lead
description: Lead our frontend engineering team in creating beautiful, performant user experiences for our AI-powered platform. You'll mentor junior developers while architecting scalable frontend solutions using modern frameworks and tools.
requirements: Expert knowledge of React and modern JavaScript

title: Product Engineer
description: Join our small but mighty team to build products that solve real problems for millions of users. You'll work closely with product managers and designers to ship features that customers love, from concept to deployment.
requirements: Strong product intuition and user empathy

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Help us scale our infrastructure and improve developer experience through automation and cloud technologies. You'll design and maintain CI/CD pipelines, monitor system performance, and ensure high availability for our services.

title: Data Scientist
description: Drive business decisions through advanced analytics and machine learning. You'll work with large datasets to uncover insights, build predictive models, and communicate findings to stakeholders across the organization.
requirements: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Build cutting-edge mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms. You'll work with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, user-friendly mobile experiences using modern development frameworks.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protect our organization from cyber threats by monitoring, analyzing, and responding to security incidents. You'll implement security measures, conduct risk assessments, and ensure compliance with industry standards.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity or related field

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Create exceptional user experiences through thoughtful design and user research. You'll collaborate with product teams to design intuitive interfaces that delight users and drive business objectives.
requirements: Proficiency in design tools (Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite)

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Deploy machine learning models at scale to solve complex business problems. You'll work on the full ML lifecycle from data preprocessing to model deployment and monitoring in production environments.
requirements: Master's degree in Computer Science, ML, or related field
Python programming and ML libraries (scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Cloud platforms (AWS SageMaker, Google AI Platform)

title: Backend Engineer
description: Build robust, scalable backend systems that power our platform. You'll design APIs, optimize database performance, and ensure system reliability while working with microservices architecture.
requirements: Strong knowledge of server-side languages (Python, Java, Go, Node.js)
